title: Amazingly, my Pixel 3XL now displays ALL audio output as text in a window. Music, Audible, PocketCas
content:
Like magic. Everything I listen to on the speaker or through Bluetooth is displayed on my screen in a black and white text box. If I tap on it, it grows.  I can move the box bit haven't figured out how to hide it.

I love it but want to be able to turn it on and off.

I have not downloaded Google Recorder and have not activated any Ease of Access. Options.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
